AzureBlade: I can get to him from the Matrix, but I assume you will
want to mount an assault too...

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Hydras:
> 
> "Tylrael's building a gun that rip apart Unicron..."said Hydras "Or 
> at last that's he belive... but will be necesary to have an extra 
> way to defeat him incase that this gun didn't fuction"
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > AzureBlade frowned.
> > 
> > AzureBlade: Yes... Unicron will be too big for one of us alone... 
> > but after, be grateful if I do not rip you apart.
> > 
> > He transformed to robot mode and looked at Hydras in the optics.
> > 
> > AzureBlade: Now, what are your plans?
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > Hydras::
> > > 
> > > "is that your way to show you loyalty, Blade??????"Roared 
> > > Hydras"I'll kill youe easyly if I wished... but we haven't time 
> to 
> > > argue about that.. after defeat Unicron you should show me your 
> > > loyalty but by now you're welcome to pass to my base"
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > > > AzureBlade roared defiantly.
> > > > 
> > > > AzureBlade: I would have terminated Prime had I not felt some 
> > > > sympathy for him in the first place. No... I am Predacon now. 
> > That 
> > > > is all the explainations that I will offer. Now welcome me, or 
> I 
> > > > will challenge you for leadership!
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> 
> > wrote:
> > > > > Hydras:
> > > > > 
> > > > > Hydras roared with fury and tookf off and faced Azure 
> > said "New 
> > > > > Warrior, Blade???? If I didn't miss understand you once 
> yelled 
> > > > that 
> > > > > you would put my head a price... and are you sure that I'll 
> > said 
> > > > > welcome after that????? what I'm sure that it isn't a 
> Prime's 
> > > > trap?"
> > > > > 
> > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> 
> > wrote:
> > > > > > He stopped in mid air and transformed to Dragon mode. He 
> > > wasn't 
> > > > > very 
> > > > > > nervous, just enthusiastic, and a bit eager to see Hydras' 
> > > > angered 
> > > > > > face when he'd tell him.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > He floated above Pred base like a King looking at his 
> > fiefdom. 
> > > > He 
> > > > > > was going to have one hell of a good time.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > AzureBlade: Hydras! Let your new warrior inside his home!
